Node.Text: Well hello, who do you think you are walking into my woods alone?

Node.OptionToEnter: I'm a clown in training looking to learn new jokes!
Node.Text: A clown in training, really, I know a lot about clowns and jokes.

Node.OptionToEnter: What do you know about clowns?
Node.Text: I know what they sound like as they die.

Node.OptionToEnter: What do you know about jokes?
Node.Text: I can deliver a killer punchline.

Node.OptionToEnter: Do you have a good joke you could tell me?
Node.Text: I could, but if I did I'd have to kill you.

Node.OptionToEnter: Who says these are your woods, why would you even be over here in the woods on your own anyway?
Node.Text: These woods are where I need to be, society shuns clowns like me.

Node.OptionToEnter: We really do live in a society, you're right
Node.Text: We do, and society can't be trusted

Node.OptionToEnter: So about this society of clowns, do you happen to know any good clown jokes?

Node.OptionToEnter: So about this society of clowns, who has the best jokes?
Node.Text: I do but I wont share them with you.

Node.OptionToEnter: What did you do that makes clown society shun you?
Node.Text: I lived life differently, took different liberties with what I think is acceptable, and showed them why they should be afraid

Node.OptionToEnter: What kind of living differently did you.. do?
Node.Text: I got very into my cooking and used some unorthadox ingredients...

Node.OptionToEnter: Could you tell me one of your recipes?
Node.Text: Yes, it's the best starting point for a good tasty stew

Node.OptionToEnter: I don't want to know about living differently, tell me a joke!
Node.Text: Tell you a joke, do you think I'm some kinda clown?!

Node.OptionToEnter: Why would you live differently, I like living normally?
Node.Text: Then I don't want to talk to you!
